RetailStoreGroupAssignment.name: RetailStoreGroupAssignment
RetailStoreGroupAssignment.description: Represents a junction between a retail store and a retail store group.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Currency used for a retail store.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

PriorityOrder.description: The order in which a store and store group assignment takes precedence over another assignment of the same store to another store group.

RetailLocationGroupId.description: The retail store group associated with the record.

RetailStoreId.description: The retail store associated with the record.
